QuestData.Title: Terrors from the Deep
QuestData.Description:
The Aqir threaten the livelihood of the Wastewanders with each passing day, but I have heard of greater terrors that have been unearthed with them.
Our fighters are able, but I fear what might happen if one of these ancient terrors falls upon us.
I know that you have experience putting down great foes. I would like to ask you to do the same for us.
After all, we can hardly help protect the forge if we've been decimated by some long-buried monster.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat 3 rare Aqir enemies in Uldum.
